sentences.english: The Indians know full well that China expects obedience from its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 印度人清楚地知道，中国希望其邻国乖乖地服从领导。

sentences.english: Pakistan is an important neighbor and strategic cooperative partner of China.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦是中国的重要邻国和战略合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Switzerland also shares Lake Constance and Lake Maggiore with its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士也和邻国共同拥有康斯坦斯湖和马焦雷湖。

sentences.english: All neighbor states must revise their policy fundaments.
sentences.chinese: 所有邻国都必须改变他们的施政基本原则。

sentences.english: North Korea has for years relied on its nuclear build-up to squeeze aid from its neighbors and the United States.
sentences.chinese: 北韩多年来靠本国的核武库向邻国及美国榨取援助。

sentences.english: It also is the same time that the ancient Monte Albán state started conquering the surrounding regions.
sentences.chinese: 这也是古老阿尔班山国家开始征服邻国的时间。

sentences.english: The spy attempted to escape to a neighbouring country.
sentences.chinese: 那个间谍企图逃到邻国去。

sentences.english: Three of them are residents of neighboring Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 其中三人在邻国瑞典有居留权。

sentences.english: Mexico cannot help but be critically dependent on its neighbor's economy.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥只能紧紧地依附于其邻国美国的经济。

sentences.english: Pakistan and its nuclear-capable neighbor India both routinely carry out tests of various missile.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦和其核邻国印度都经常进行各种导弹试射。

sentences.english: Neighbors who were at war would call a truce to participate in the games.
sentences.chinese: 那些在战争中的邻国都会号召暂时休兵以参加运动会。

sentences.english: We have solved border issues with 12 neighboring countries sharing land border with us.
sentences.chinese: 中国同12个陆地邻国解决了历史遗留的边界问题。

sentences.english: Many other North Koreans have left their country to live illegally in neighboring China.
sentences.chinese: 很多北韩人逃离后非法住在邻国中国。

sentences.english: And after two years Malawi became a food donor to neighbouring countries.
sentences.chinese: 两年后，马拉维成为了邻国的食品捐助国。

sentences.english: China currently has unresolved land and sea border disputes with 11 other neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 中国目前与其它11个邻国存在领土和海疆纠纷。

sentences.english: The king was prepared to levy war on his neighbour after their quarrel over the land.
sentences.chinese: 国王与领国与邻土之争以后，就准备对邻国宣战。

definition: Shikoku (one of the four main islands of Japan)
